merata samastha korona wairas aasadithayan sankhyawa 301,272k.me athara korona wairasaya aasadanaya wi rohalgathawa prathikara labamin siti thawath 1499 deneku suwaya laba rohalwalin pitawa gos thibenawa.ee anuwa suwaya labu samastha aasadithayan sankhyawa dakwenne 271,855k lesatayi.me athara, merata awurudu 30 ta wadi janagahanayen 68.4% kata korona ennathaka ek mathrawak ho labadi athi bawa saukhya amathyanshaya pawasanawa.astraseneka ennath mathra 728,460 k labana 31 wanida paswaruwe meratata ragena ena bawa saukhya amathini pawithra wanniaarachchi sandahan kala.
